name: Minimally Prettifying 8tracks
description: This purely aesthetic 8tracks stylish features a seamless image of an edited Steven Universe background compatible with any resolution or screen size that appears as the 8tracks header and the background for the playback tab, with matching blue and pink accents on every button. If you need something adjusted, customized, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs.
additional_info:
I'll be adding image & color options if this theme does well.

Update: Erased any turquoise left (hopefully).
